creator: rstoyanchev@yahoo.com
text:
For type-based Endpoint's, WsServlet instantiates the Endpoint via reflection instead of using the Configurator as is done in PojoEndpointServer:

sec.getConfigurator().getEndpointInstance(sec.getEndpointClass())

creator: rstoyanchev@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 30104
Patch for WsServlet

Here is a sample patch for the issue.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the patch. It has been applied to trunk.
